featuredTutorialCards.description: Waypoint enables you to publish any application to any platform with a single file and command. Build, deploy, and release applications programmatically using HashiCorp Configuration Language.
featuredTutorialCards.heading: Introduction to Waypoint

featuredTutorialCards.description: Install the Waypoint binary locally on MacOS, Linux, or Windows, manually or with a package manager.
featuredTutorialCards.heading: Install Waypoint

featuredTutorialCards.description: Release applications to a local Nomad cluster.
featuredTutorialCards.heading: Deploy an Application to Nomad

featuredTutorialCards.description: Run a NodeJS application onto AWS Elastic Container Service (ECS) with Waypoint
featuredTutorialCards.heading: Deploy an Application to AWS Elastic Container Service

featuredTutorialCards.description: Deploy an application onto an Azure Container Instance with Waypoint
featuredTutorialCards.heading: Deploy an application onto an Azure Container Instance

featuredTutorialCards.description: Run an application on Google Cloud Run with Waypoint
featuredTutorialCards.heading: Deploy an Application to Google Cloud Run

sidecarMarketingCard.title: About Waypoint
sidecarMarketingCard.subtitle: Deploy, manage, and observe your applications through a consistent abstraction of underlying infrastructure. Waypoint works with Kubernetes, ECS and many other platforms.

sidecarHcpCallout.heading: HCP Waypoint
sidecarHcpCallout.description: Simplify your application deployments across platforms

metadata.title: Waypoint by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Waypoint provides a modern workflow for build, deploy, and release across platforms.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Waypoint Integrations.

packageManagers.label: Homebrew
packageManagers.installCodeHtml: $ brew tap hashicorp/tap $ brew install hashicorp/tap/waypoint

packageManagers.label: Ubuntu/Debian
commands: sudo apt update && sudo apt install waypoint
packageManagers.installCodeHtml: $ wget -O- https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/hashicorp-archive-keyring.gpg $ echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/hashicorp-archive-keyring.gpg] https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com $(lsb_release -cs) main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/hashicorp.list $ sudo apt update && sudo apt install waypoint

packageManagers.label: CentOS/RHEL
packageManagers.installCodeHtml: $ sudo yum install -y yum-utils $ sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://rpm.releases.hashicorp.com/RHEL/hashicorp.repo $ sudo yum -y install waypoint

packageManagers.label: Fedora
packageManagers.installCodeHtml: $ sudo dnf install -y dnf-plugins-core $ sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://rpm.releases.hashicorp.com/fedora/hashicorp.repo $ sudo dnf -y install waypoint

packageManagers.label: Amazon Linux
packageManagers.installCodeHtml: $ sudo yum install -y yum-utils shadow-utils $ sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://rpm.releases.hashicorp.com/AmazonLinux/hashicorp.repo $ sudo yum -y install waypoint

packageManagers.label: Homebrew
packageManagers.installCodeHtml: $ brew tap hashicorp/tap $ brew install hashicorp/tap/waypoint
